sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-topnav', templateUrl: './topnav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./topnav.component.css'] }) export class TopnavComponent implements OnInit{ public isLoggedIn!:boolean public userId!: string constructor( private readonly authService: AuthService ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.isLoggedIn = this.authService.isLoggedIn let id = localStorage.getItem('sub') if(id) { this.userId = id } } logout() { this.authService.doLogout() } }
